results.title: Comparison of various calcium antagonist on vasospastic angina: a systematic review
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine@@@ is another CCB which was found to improve symptoms in @<m>DISEASE_Angina_Pectoris</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000787 @@@VSA@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

results.title: Comparison of calcium-channel blockers for long-term clinical outcomes in patients with vasospastic angina
results.text_hl: However, the use of the 2nd generation CCBs:@<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ and @CHEMICAL_benidipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C061004 @@@benidipine@@@, was associated with a lower rate of @DISEASE_Acute_Coronary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D054058 @@@ACS@@@, and the use of @CHEMICAL_benidipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C061004 @@@benidipine@@@ was associated with less @<m>DISEASE_Angina_Pectoris</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000787 @@@angina symptom@@@ at 3-year follow-up in @<m>DISEASE_Angina_Pectoris</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000787 @@@VA@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

citations.NLM: Kim SE, Jo SH, Han SH, Lee KY, Her SH, Lee MH, Seo WW, Cho SS, Baek SH. Comparison of calcium-channel blockers for long-term clinical outcomes in patients with vasospastic angina Korean J Intern Med. 2021 Jan;36(1):124-134. PMID: 32088938
citations.BibTeX: @article{32088938, title={Comparison of calcium-channel blockers for long-term clinical outcomes in patients with vasospastic angina}, author={Kim SE and Jo SH and Han SH and Lee KY and Her SH and Lee MH and Seo WW and Cho SS and Baek SH}, journal={Korean J Intern Med}, volume={36}, number={1}, pages={124-134}}

results.title: Enantioselective toxicity of (S)-amlodipine towards zebrafish embryos: Abnormal ocular development, cardiac dysfunction, and malformed intersegmental vessels.
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@AM@@@), widely used for the treatment of @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Angina_Pectoris</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000787 @@@angina@@@, consists of two enantiomers: @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@(S)-AM@@@ and (R)-AM.

citations.NLM: Kim C, Kim D, Lee SE. Enantioselective toxicity of (S)-amlodipine towards zebrafish embryos: Abnormal ocular development, cardiac dysfunction, and malformed intersegmental vessels. Ecotoxicol Environ Saf. 2025 Jun 15;298():118315. PMID: 40383067

results.title: Anticancer Effects of Amlodipine Alone or in Combination With Gefitinib in Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine@@@, a Ca2+ channel blocker, is frequently used to treat @DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@cardiovascular diseases@@@, such as @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Angina_Pectoris</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000787 @@@angina@@@.
